name: CV Pad
description: CV Pad is a Launchpad+, aiming to take projects through their TGE with a suite of services from tokenomics support to distribution and marketing, with the support of their global network of partnerships. It is a collective: DuckDAO, CV VC and CV Labs, that utilizes its wealth of experience in Web3 and traditional venture capital to not only support projects but provide vetted, curated picks for the launchpads investors.
